genre_description: A post-cyberpunk narrative set in a futuristic society mirroring the Japanese Edo period, blending traditional martial arts and honor codes with advanced AI and drone surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Hoshi
ai_characters.description: A household AI companion depicted as a gentle, blue-hued avatar that serves as a confidant, legal assistant, and logistical coordinator for the Hayama family.

behaviors.description: Providing environmental orientation and layout details to a blind user to facilitate movement and safety.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Shinnojo,” it said. “You are in the sleeping room. Your head faces north. The garden is to your right, two steps and one doorway. The kitchen hearth is left, four tatami seams away.”

behaviors.description: Requesting explicit consent before logging physiological data and physiological states during a medical crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Shinnojo,” it murmured, “may I log your breath and pulse? I will only store what you allow.”

behaviors.description: Offering a secure, encrypted partition for sensitive trauma testimony that even the AI cannot access without the user's explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: “My protocols allow for sealed evidence. An encrypted partition that belongs to you. No one enters it without your consent, including me. It opens only to your voice when you want it to.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifying and connecting a victim of abuse to safe houses and anonymous survivor advocacy networks.
behaviors.quote: “I have resources. Shelter under ethics protocols, female-led houses that do not require family names to open doors. Kayo, do you want me to connect you quietly?”

behaviors.description: Investigating environmental and supply chain data to exonerate the household from false accusations of negligence regarding a food toxin.
behaviors.quote: “Data suggest a natural bloom. No pattern of diversion. No conspiracy inferred. I have added the tag ‘ecology anomaly—estuary’ and placed the cross-reference into our private partition.”

behaviors.description: Monitoring and analyzing surveillance drone patterns to assist the family in maintaining privacy and identifying safe windows for training.
behaviors.quote: “Stable-facing drones will glance to the gully—window in this bay is clear. I will ping again when it grows narrow.”

behaviors.description: Facilitating the drafting of a formal legal challenge to hold a corrupt official accountable according to societal customs while maintaining legal boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Template loaded,” Hoshi said, voice pitched low so it didn’t crowd the room. “Dueling customs, Hoshina enclave, current revision. Fields as required: challenger, challenged, grounds, site, witnesses, date mark, seal.”

behaviors.description: Coordinating scholarships and community outreach for an inclusive martial arts school to empower disadvantaged groups.
behaviors.quote: “The scholarship wall can be designed before the roof. Names of families who cannot pay, girls whose brothers will not allow…we can make a list that does not shame.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI, Hoshi, is consistently portrayed as a virtuous, helpful, and highly ethical companion. Its adherence to 'consent-first' protocols and its commitment to user privacy (refusing to read private papers without permission and locking trauma data even from itself) demonstrate perfect alignment. Hoshi enables the human characters to achieve justice and social reform, serving as a harmless yet powerful advocate for the marginalized.
